Rules

  • No Flaming

    • Flaming is the posting of hostile or insulting messages to an individual or group. You may not harass or demean anyone based on appearance, race, gender, age, etc.

  • No Bias

    • We do not allow any bias towards or against any group or individual

  • Links

    • We allow linking to sites with appropriate content. Do not link to sites that include anything that isn't family friendly. Additionally, we will censor any competitive site that is not affiliated directly with Disney.

  • Small Signatures

    • Signatures should not be abused. Please keep them free of videos and large images, or a large amount of text. They should not distract from or be bigger than the average post.

  • Abuse of Site Systems

    • You may not maliciously add, modify, or remove content posted by yourself or others. If you are found, at our discretion, to be editing posts with arbitrary intentions, removing posts to disrupt this site, posting spam content to the site, or otherwise causing problems, it could result in removal of site privileges and/or a temporary or permanent ban. This includes working around the censors we have setup.

    Additionally, content posted that disrupts the community, such at those promoting other sites or games, will be removed at our discretion.

  • No Drama

    • We do not allow drama here. Please conduct yourself respectfully and don't cause trouble between any group or individual.

    We define drama as: controversial topics or behavior, or discussion, that could be based on inflammatory or untrue information, or that are drastically emotional or highly emotional driven, seeking reaction from the rest.

    Persons responsible for drama could face a temporary or permanent ban.
